definition: to vanish/to disappear from the face of the earth
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
to evaporate/(of cooking) to steam/torch made from hemp stalks or bamboo (old)/finely chopped firewood (old)
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: Oslash; Defensor and Menesor are vaporised after being caught in a plasma flare.
sentences.chinese: 守护神与飞天虎于一次等离子爆炸中人间蒸发。

sentences.english: Many are extracted from police custody only by bribes.
sentences.chinese: 许多人都是通过贿赂才从警察的拘留下人间蒸发。

sentences.english: Defensor and Menesor are vaporised after being caught in a plasma flare.
sentences.chinese: 守护神与飞天虎于一次等离子爆炸中人间蒸发。

definition: to vanish without trace (idiom)/to lie low
lit. to throw a stone and see it sink without trace in the sea (idiom)/fig. to elicit no response
to receive no news whatsoever about sb
to take funds (esp. illegally or corruptly obtained)
to escape without trace (idiom); to make one's getaway (from the scene of a crime)/to show a clean pair of heels
